numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice that clean electricity generation increased more than fossil electricity generation.
2. This is evident because nuclear electricity generation increased by a little over 10 million.
3. This is evident because hydroelectricity generation increased by a little over 10 million.
4. This is evident because wind electricity generation increased by a little over 10 million.
5. This is evident because solar electricity generation increased by a little over 10 million.
6. I wonder how this graph was created.
7. I wonder what sampling method was used to obtain the data.
8. The whole world requires all electricity generations that are shown in the graph.
9. My community can get a better understanding of the increase of these electricity generations.
10. This understanding can bring awareness that fossil electricity generation may need to be reduced.
11. Communities can gather to help reduce fossil electricity generation.
12. The headline is: Electricity generations increase by millions each year.
